version_description:
Hey, Game of Lifers!
We’ve been working hard and made several behind the scenes improvements to keep the game perky.
Update now to enjoy the brand new Action Cards look and fill up your wallet when your friends spin your Lucky Number.
Have lots of fun with this update, stay tuned and thanks for playing!

Hey, Game of Lifers!
We’ve been working hard and made several behind the scenes improvements to keep the game perky.
Update now to enjoy the brand new Action Cards look and fill up your wallet when your friends spin your Lucky Number.
Have lots of fun with this update, stay tuned and thanks for playing!

Hey, Game of Lifers!
We’ve been working hard and made several behind the scenes improvements to keep the game perky.
Update now to enjoy the brand new Action Cards look and fill up your wallet when your friends spin your Lucky Number.
Have lots of fun with this update, stay tuned and thanks for playing!

Now you can experience THE GAME OF LIFE in unique new worlds. Along with stylized environments, each World will feature new vehicles, player colours, emoticons, and new Career options. We are also introducing an exciting new feature: Avatars! Choose which avatar you want to flaunt to your opponents and get exclusive spooky Avatars when you get the Halloween World.
Keep playing and stay tuned for new updates!

*** 66% OFF HALLOWEEN SALE!! ***

Now you can experience THE GAME OF LIFE in unique new worlds. Along with stylized environments, each World will feature new vehicles, player colours, emoticons, and new Career options. We are also introducing an exciting new feature: Avatars! Choose which avatar you want to flaunt to your opponents and get exclusive spooky Avatars when you get the Halloween World.
Keep playing and stay tuned for new updates!

Hey Game of Life players!

We hope you had a terrifying Halloween! To keep you in the spirit for a bit longer, we have a special deal for you in the World Selection. Go check it out!

Hey Game of Life players!

We hope you had a terrifying Halloween! To keep you in the spirit for a bit longer, we have a special deal for you in the World Selection.
Also, performance fixes have been implemented to make your game more stable.

Go check it out!

Hey Game of Life players!
Are you ready for an even more magical THE GAME OF LIFE experience? A new adventure awaits you in our freezing new Winter Wonderland! Discover wintry careers, vehicles and many other features that will give your game a more seasonal spirit!
Also, performance fixes have been implemented to make your game more stable.

Stay tuned for more updates!

Hey Game of Life players!
Are you ready for an even more magical THE GAME OF LIFE experience? A new adventure awaits you in our freezing new Winter Wonderland! Discover wintry careers, vehicles and many other features that will give your game a more seasonal spirit!
Also, performance fixes have been implemented to make your game more stable.

Stay tuned for more updates!

Hey Game of Life players!
Are you ready for an even more magical THE GAME OF LIFE experience? A new adventure awaits you in our freezing new Winter Wonderland! Discover wintry careers, vehicles and many other features that will give your game a more seasonal spirit!
Also, performance fixes have been implemented to make your game more stable.

Stay tuned for more updates!

Hey Game of Life players!
Are you ready for an even more magical The Game of Life experience? A new adventure awaits you in our freezing new Winter Wonderland! Discover wintry careers, vehicles and many other features that will give your game a more seasonal spirit!
Also, performance fixes have been implemented to make your game more stable.

Stay tuned for more updates!

Hey Game of Life players!
While the cold winds blast outside, take comfort in our Winter Wonderland and enjoy all these new additions:

- NEW MINIGAME: Land on a minigame tile and compete in our brand new “Traffic Jam” minigame!
- NEW WORLD: Hop into our fun and crazy new Birthday Party World for a blast of colours and delicious cakes, and enjoy a world where your imagination is the limit!
- NEW SPORTS PACK: Check out our Sports Pack that gives your Vehicles and Avatars that extra “oomph”!

Enjoy!

Hey Game of Life players!

The sun is back and the ice has melted, revealing a lush, blossoming world. Come check it out!
- NEW WORLD: Take a walk in our beautiful Spring Blossom World and feel calm and refreshed, then take up an outdoor profession so you never have to be apart from Nature again.
- FIXES: Performance fixes have been implemented to make your game more stable.

Enjoy!

Hey Game of Life players!

Wild creatures have taken over our game! Are you brave enough to come check them out?
- NEW WORLD: Visit our Wild Safari world and have an adventure in the untamed wilds!
- NEW SCI-FI PACK: Take a leap to the future and modernize your vehicles and avatars with the Sci-Fi Pack!
- NEW VINTAGE PACK: Turn back the clock and give your vehicles and avatars a classy makeover with the Vintage Pack!
- FIXES: Performance fixes have been implemented to make your game more stable.

Enjoy!

Hi Game of Life players!

A mysterious island has appeared far away on the horizon. Hop on your ship and set sail to a new adventure!
- NEW WORLD: Pirates have hidden their plunder all over Pirate Cove island. Grab your hat and eye patch, and join the funniest treasure hunt ever!
- NEW PACK: Get in touch with your primal roots with our Stone Age Pack!

Further performance fixes were also implemented to make your game more stable.
Enjoy!

Hey Game of Life players!
A powerful wizard's spell went wrong and wonderful things started to happen in The Game of Life!
- NEW WORLD: Bring some magic into your Life! Visit our Enchanted Valley world, a place where your imagination is the limit!
- NEW PACK: Bored of their arcade stations, Pixels decided to have a break in The Game of Life!
- FIXES: Performance fixes have been implemented to make your game more stable.

Hey Game of Life players,
It’s our Birthday!
The Game of Life is 1 year old and what an amazing journey it has been! As thanks to all of our wonderful players, we have a lot of surprises in this update.
- FREE WORLD: Birthday Party is free for a limited time. Come celebrate with us!
- NEW WORLD: Try your hand at farming and see the fruits of your labor in our Ranch Life world.
- NEW PACK: It’s an emergency! Join your Rescue Team and be a hero!
- FIXES: Performance fixes have been implemented to make your game more stable.

Enjoy!

Hey Game of Life players,

- NEW WORLD: Try your hand at farming and see the fruits of your labor in our Ranch Life world.
- NEW PACK: It’s an emergency! Join your Rescue Team and be a hero!
- FIXES: Performance fixes have been implemented to make your game more stable.

Enjoy!

Hello, Game of Life players!
On top of the new Summer Beach Party world, there's a new treat for you in the store! Check out our new deals on world bundles and get the best value for your money!

Hello, Game of Life players!
On top of the new Summer Beach Party world, there's a new treat for you in the store! Check out our new deals on world bundles and get the best value for your money!

Halloween has arrived to The Game of Life.
Spooky creatures have taken over our game to celebrate the most haunting season with you! Check our special Halloween offers and don't miss the chance to add some magic to your Life!

Holiday Celebrations have arrived to The Game of Life.
Jolly snowmen have taken over our game to celebrate the most magical season with you! Check our special Holiday offers and don't miss the chance to add some cheer to your Life!

Hello Game of Life players!
We have issued some fixes to make your game more stable.
Enjoy!

Enjoy!

Enjoy!
